title: My account banned, though I wasn't on it.
body:
I understand the concept of banning an account for the use of Malicious or 3rd party software, but what I don't understand is how a player can be accused or tried for such a thing if the last game played and the time of the ban are different.

My last game on this account was March 28th. I tried to play a game yesterday (June 19th) and was informed via pop-up message saying that my account was permanently banned and that I should refer to my email for detailed info. The email and the ban was issued on April 13th....

If my account was not used how exactly was there a use of 3rd party malicious software? And why is it that  Riot won't even look into the situation to give me further information? 

My card information as well as my financial contribution to the game are being held hostage!

I just want answers... It doesn't make sense..

replies.body: We can investigate what happened on your account if you submit a [ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to our player behavior team. From there they will investigate what took place on your account.
